channel.title: Need help with getting server 100% uptime
channel.description: i got my server and its was early 100% uptime but now is 96% up and 4% down. what i need to do to get 100% uptime again? :confused:

item.title: Need help with getting server 100% uptime
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Unfortunately, its very hard to keep an 100% uptime,

but there is no way to get back up to 100% other than just remaking the server and readding it,

but if you fell below 100% at any time, it means that your server was offline for a time,

and if you server was offline even for a few minutes, then its not up 100% so you shouldnt have 100% uptime if your server hasnt been up 100% since you created it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with getting server 100% uptime

item.title: Need help with getting server 100% uptime
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:5, topic:370349”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=466457.msg3411503#msg3411503 date=1290719361]
I dont youse Mopars status Page But Can you post more than 1? because if you can just make another ip on ino-ip and use that
[/quote]

I suppose you could, but you’d need to change your ip address for it to work. You’re better of sticking with your current one.[/quote]

i Guess so but If he really wanted to do that he could just use a web proxy

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with getting server 100% uptime
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Samih1996:

lol, its simple. Just create a new ip at No-Ip.com, and you have two posts saying online. Its a good idea. You will have more people playing.

I’m pretty sure it’d check the hosts actual IP, not just the no-ip. If it didn’t thats just moronic.

I dont youse Mopars status Page But Can you post more than 1? because if you can just make another ip on ino-ip and use that
